title: Brooklyn Subway Shooting: Multiple Shot – NBC New York - NBC New York
content:
1. Brooklyn Subway Shooting: Multiple Shot – NBC New York  NBC New York
  2. NYC mayor not at scene of Brooklyn subway attack, has COVID  PIX11

  4. At least 29 injured in Brooklyn subway shooting, undetonated devices found  New York Post
  5. Uber, Lyft accused of upping prices after Brooklyn subway attack  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: At least 10 Brooklyn subway riders were shot Tuesday by a man wearing a gas mask and a green construction vest who tossed a smoke canister in the train car to distract the rush hour crowd before opening fire, officials and law enforcement sources said. Another 19 or so straphangers were hurt in the chaos that followed the shooting aboard…
